EmailTemplate.subject: Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa with Safari365
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
In celebration of 10 years creating incredible African travel memories, Safari365 is giving away a life changing 10 day safari valued at more than USD 10,000.
How to enter: Simply tell us your African favourite destinations and experiences, and recommend a friend who could be interested in winning a trip to Africa. We will send your friend an introductory email with the opportunity to opt out.
You will be automatically entered into the draw and yourself and a partner could be jetting of to see the best Southern Africa has to offer.
Click Here to Enter
https://www.safari365.com/competition/{!Lead.Members_Club_ID__c}
Winners to be announced on 21 November 2016
Good luck!! Safari365
Prize Inclusive of the following:
4 nights at the luxurious Cape Cadagon boutique hotel in Cape Town A 15 minute helicopter flip over Cape Town 3 nights on safari seeing the Big 5 at Simbavati River Lodge in the Kruger National Park 2 nights at Victoria's Falls at the 5 star Elephant Camp Lodge (including a sunset river cruise and tour of the falls) All internal flights and 4 days of car hire in Cape Town
